attributes.action: make a greater charge for continental lorries over British Lorries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Continental lorries arriving at our Ports being charge per mile for usage of our British Road System as they do not pay our Vehicle Licence Tax.  These vehicles being larger, damage our road system and this charge could be used to upgrade our Roads. Living by a sea-port, I see Continental Lorries thundering into our ports with equal size trailers.
